unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs and cinephiles! Film festival season is officially ON! And this year looks even more exciting than ever.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs and cinephiles! Film festival season is officially on! And this year looks even more exciting than ever.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a HUGE comeback after a brief hiatus. Think world premieres, cutting-edge indie flicks, and maybe even a celebrity sighting or two near the Gateway of India.
normalised: Word on the street is that the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a huge comeback after a brief hiatus. Think world premieres, cutting-edge indie flicks, and maybe even a celebrity sighting or two near the Gateway of India.

unnormalised: But it's not just Mumbai. Down South, whispers are swirling about the Chennai International Film Festival, promising a delicious blend of Tamil cinema and international gems. Imagine catching a thought-provoking documentary and then grabbing a plate of spicy biryani - pure bliss!
normalised: But it's not just Mumbai. Down South, whispers are swirling about the Chennai International Film Festival, promising a delicious blend of Tamil cinema and international gems. Imagine catching a thought-provoking documentary and then grabbing a plate of spicy biryani - pure bliss!

unnormalised: Plus, the buzz is that various smaller, regional festivals are popping up all over, showcasing the incredible diversity of Indian filmmaking. Remember that time someone's short film from FTII, Pune won big at Cannes? Maybe the next big thing is premiering somewhere right now!
normalised: Plus, the buzz is that various smaller, regional festivals are popping up all over, showcasing the incredible diversity of Indian filmmaking. Remember that time someone's short film from F T I I, Pune won big at Cannes? Maybe the next big thing is premiering somewhere right now!

unnormalised: From Delhi's indie scene to Kolkata's artistic flair, film festivals are where stories come alive. So, keep an eye on those schedules and get ready to explore the magic of cinema, folks! And maybe pack an umbrella, just in case Mumbai decides to rain cats and dogs.
normalised: From Delhi's indie scene to Kolkata's artistic flair, film festivals are where stories come alive. So, keep an eye on those schedules and get ready to explore the magic of cinema, folks! And maybe pack an umbrella, just in case Mumbai decides to rain cats and dogs.
